relation: We offer Postgres as a service: you can focus on building your application, and we'll wrangle the database. We handle backups, security, monitoring and alerting, system administration, and server upgrades. You get a Postgres endpoint that works with any standard Postgres client software. Our servers are hosted on fast SSD drives at DigitalOcean. Deployments are currently available in San Francisco, New York, London, Amsterdam, and Singapore; additional locations may be available by the time you read this. Control your databases from a web console or with our easy REST API. Most common Postgres extensions are included for free, including PostGIS. Custom setups are available, and we're always adding new features based on user requests.
We cater to customers who wish to focus their time on their core application and outsource the management of their database to us.
We have decades of experience building and operating mission-critical high availability Unix systems. Contact us for full details.

textAfterTable: Description AcuGIS provides PostgreSQL hosting and PostgreSQL based GIS hosting services to individuals, businesses, and academic and research institutions in over 40 countries worldwide. AcuGIS offers full support for both PostgreSQL 8 and PostgreSQL 9. Our highly knowledgeable support staff is focused on PostgreSQL. Combined with our Enterprise grade hardware and exclusive PostgreSQL tools, you can be assured of reliable, high performance PostgreSQL hosting services. Number of employees 10 Office locations New York, London, Frankfurt Hours 24x7x365 Languages English Experience Providing PostgreSQL hosting and support services since 2005. Clients in over 40 countries worldwide. Contact information info@acugis.com Name Adminia Sistemas (http://www.adminia.es) Description Adminia offers technological consulting and professional system administration services, specializing in free software and virtualized high-availability environments. We have over 15 years experience in deploying and managing PostgreSQL database servers in data processing centres, small and medium-sized businesses and universities. We are located in Madrid, Spain. Contact us for reliable and expert partnership via email or visit our website. Office locations Madrid, Spain Languages Spanish, English
